executable.title: Resample Code Image
executable.description: This program will resample a short integer code image using either the Rigid or Inverse-B-Spline transform. The reference image is the DTI tensor anisotropy image space, and the input code image is in anatomical space.
executable.acknowledgements: Funding for this version of the GTRACT program was provided by NIH/NINDS R01NS050568-01A2S1
executable.contributor: This tool was developed by Vincent Magnotta and Greg Harris.

parameters.label: Input Parameters
parameters.description: Parameters for specifying the code image, the transform filename, the transform type, and the standard image (whose characteristics will be cloned).

image.name: inputCodeVolume
image.description: Required: input file containing the code image
image.label: Input Code Image Volume

image.name: inputReferenceVolume
image.description: Required: input file containing the standard image to clone the characteristics of.
image.label: Input Reference Image Volume

transform.name: inputTransform
transform.description: Required: input Rigid or Inverse-B-Spline transform file name
transform.label: Input Transform

parameters.label: Output File
parameters.description: Output file from resampling the input code image

image.name: outputVolume
image.description: Required: name of output NRRD file containing the resampled code image in acquisition space.
image.label: Output Code Image Volume

integer.name: numberOfThreads
integer.label: Number Of Threads
integer.description: Explicitly specify the maximum number of threads to use.
